_comment: MCP Server Configuration for Code Review
_description: Connects to GitHub MCP server to enable GitHub integration capabilities during code review operations. Requires GITHUB_TOKEN environment variable.

github._description: GitHub MCP server for repository operations, code review, and issue management. Useful for creating issues, PRs, and pushing code review results directly to GitHub.

_usage: 1. Set GITHUB_TOKEN environment variable with a Personal Access Token
2. Ensure npx is available in your PATH (comes with Node.js)
3. The GitHub MCP server requires repo, workflow, and read:org scopes
4. Reference this config in copilot-cli.properties: MCP_CONFIG_FILE=mcp-config.json

_code_review_integration.description: This configuration enables the code review agent to:
capabilities: Create GitHub issues for identified code quality concerns
Submit pull request comments with review findings
Push review reports to a documentation branch
Search for similar code patterns across repositories
Create tracking branches for refactoring suggestions
